UT 
SHEHU IDRIS requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit 
passes in English Language, Mathematics, 
Biology/Health Science, Chemistry, one (1) of 
Food and Nutrition, Geography, Economics, 
Physics, Agricultural Science, Commerce and 
Technical Drawing.  
RIVCOST requires  ‘O’ level credit passes in 
English Language, Mathematics, Biology,  
Physics and Chemistry as course 
requirements. It also requires Chemistry, 
Biology and Physics/Mathematics as UTME 
subjects.
